clinical_study.brief_title: Mesenchymal Stem Cell Infusion as Prevention for Graft Rejection and Graft-versus-host Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Mesenchymal Stem Cell Infusion as Prevention for Graft Rejection and Graft-versus-host Disease After Allogeneic Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation With Nonmyeloablative Conditioning: a Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: Mesenchymal Stem Cell Infusion as Prevention for Graft Rejection and Graft-Versus-Host Disease After Allogeneic Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation With Nonmyeloablative Conditioning from HLA-mismatched PBSC or cord blood: a Pilot Study

secondary_outcome.measure: 1. Hematopoietic engraftment and graft rejection. 2. Incidence of grade II-IV and III-IV acute GVHD. 3. Immunologic reconstitution

arm_group.description: MSC co-infusion with either HLA-mismatched PBSC or cord blood

intervention.description: Infusion of mesenchymal stem cells on the same day as hematopoietic stem cell infusion.

clinical_study.keyword: HCT, nonmyeloablative, mesenchymal stem cells, GVHD
